name: Hold On (Emotion Games)
description:
HOLD ON

Welcome to White S. Corp. the biggest company of the Biggest Nation of The World! We are doing amazing researches with robots, and you have passed on our admission process to test all the new robots that we are creating here. Enjoy your oportunity working with us and remember, we are the good people!

Instructions

Remember SPACE BUTTON controls everything!

  • Press to change an option or gravity of the N in test rooms;
  • Hold to choose the option or pause test.

We are the good people!

White S. Corp (c) 1960.
